mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHALL_TABLE ( CHALL_TITLE, CHALL_DESCRIPTION, CHALL_CATEGORY_IDX, MIN_PARTICIPATION_TIME, TOTAL_CLEAR_TIME, MAX_PARTICIPANTS, CHALL_CREATED_AT, CHALL_STATE, CHALL_START_TIME, CHALL_END_TIME, USER_JOIN, DURATION, CHALLENGE_TYPE, VISIBILITY_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{challTitle}, #{challDescription}, #{challCategoryIdx}, #{minParticipationTime}, #{totalClearTime}, #{maxParticipants}, NOW(), #{challState}, #{challStartTime}, #{challEndTime}, #{userJoin}, #{duration}, #{challengeType}, #{visibilityType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CHALL_TABLE SET CHALL_STATE = 'END', CHALL_END_TIME = NOW() WHERE CHALL_IDX = #{challIdx} AND CHALL_STATE != 'END'
mapper.select: SELECT CHALL_IDX, CHALL_TITLE, CHALL_DESCRIPTION, CHALL_CATEGORY_IDX, MIN_PARTICIPATION_TIME, TOTAL_CLEAR_TIME, MAX_PARTICIPANTS, CHALL_START_TIME, CHALL_END_TIME, CHALL_CREATED_AT, CHALL_STATE, DURATION, USER_JOIN FROM CHALL_TABLE WHERE CHALL_IDX = #{challIdx}

SELECT cj.CHALL_JOIN_IDX, cj.CHALL_IDX, cj.USER_IDX, u.USER_NICK AS userNick, cj.ACTIVITY, cj.ACTIVITY_TIME FROM CHALL_JOIN cj JOIN USER_TABLE u ON cj.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX WHERE cj.CHALL_IDX = #{challIdx}
